entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Malay Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:01 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Malay Falls 03:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023
